pr_title: Deprecate the start/stop Future-based methods in AbstractVerticle

timeline.message:
Deprecate AbstractVerticle#start(Future) and AbstractVerticle#stop(Future)

Otherwise IDEs do not report these methods as deprecated, even if the Verticle interface has them deprecated.

Signed-off-by: Julien Ponge <jponge@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think it should be AbstractVerticle#start(Promise) as link
timeline.author: vietj

replies.bodyText: I mean this is clearly a message for people extending this interface as no user calls this method in practice (beside the vertx deployment), so the message rather should be instead override {@link AbstractVerticle#start(Promise)}
replies.author: vietj

replies.bodyText: the wording should be changed too to instead override {@link AbstractVerticle#start(Promise)}
replies.author: vietj
